parameters.param:
<project name="build mbeddr distributions">
<property name="base-url" value="https://teamcity.jetbrains.com/httpAuth/app/rest/builds"/> <property name="jdk-build-id" value="buildType:MPS_34_GetMpsHelp"/> <property name="branch" value="branch:default:true"/> <property name="latest-build" value="status:SUCCESS"/> <property name="jdk-artifacts-url" value="${base-url}/${jdk-build-id},${branch},${latest-build}/artifacts/files"/>
<target name="get-jdk"> <echo> Getting custom jdk</echo> <property name="mac-jdk-url" value="${jdk-artifacts-url}/openJDK/jdk.tar.gz"/> <get src="${mac-jdk-url}" dest="." verbose="true" skipexisting="true" usetimestamp="true" username="${server.user}" password="${server.password}" />
<property name="win-jdk-url" value="${jdk-artifacts-url}/JDK/jdk.zip"/> <get src="${win-jdk-url}" dest="." verbose="true" skipexisting="true" usetimestamp="true" username="${server.user}" password="${server.password}" /> </target>
</project>
